snippet: Encouraging earnings news helped nudge stocks up in afternoon trading, but gold slumped to its lowest level in five years, pulling mining stocks lower.
abstract: Stock markets close slightly higher after listless day of trading.
lead_paragraph: Encouraging earnings news helped nudge stocks up in afternoon trading, but gold slumped to its lowest level in five years, pulling mining stocks lower.

headline.main: Wall St. Drifts Higher, but Oil and Gold Decline
headline.print_headline: Market Drifts Higher, but Oil and Gold Decline
